description: A devastating attack where Bartholomew Kuma creates an enormous paw bubble between his outstretched arms by compressing air repeatedly using his paw pads. When launched, it creates a massive paw-shaped explosion with tremendous destructive force.

firstUse.context: Used against Little Oars Jr. during the Battle of Marineford, critically damaging the ancient giant, shattering his blade, destroying the ice sheet, and causing massive structural damage to Marineford Bay.

description: Gecko Moria creates shadow spears shaped like horns that impale opponents. The technique is powerful enough to finish off even ancient giants.

firstUse.context: Used to impale Little Oars Jr. and deliver the final blow, bringing down the giant as he reached for the execution platform during the Battle of Marineford.
